data.title: The Assembly Hollywood
data.meta_description: Delve into the latest AML regulatory trends, technological advances, new crime typologies and case studies, enforcement actions and more. Sign up today!
data.text:
Registration is now closed.

We are all futurologists now.

Changes that once took years or even decades to take shape now happen in months. Keeping up with all the developments affecting the compliance world means keeping abreast of technology, crime trends, geopolitics, the economy and the regulatory environment. Criminals keep flipping the script, evasion techniques multiply at least as fast as sanctions and export controls, and tech is part of the problem as well as the solution.

But there’s an antidote for future shock: Combine today’s knowledge with tomorrow’s skills, and repeat as needed. That’s the essence of every ACAMS conference, and it’s even more critical now. The AML/AFC mission — encompassing financial crime fighting, sanctions enforcement, and even the guided evolution of the global financial system — can only be achieved through a concerted, combined effort. To be part of it, join like-minded peers, top industry experts, and leading regulators from April 8 through 10 at the Diplomat Hotel in Hollywood, FL, for The Assembly Hollywood. Don’t miss the insights, guidance, connections, and training that will provide known benefits well into an unknowable future.

Participation must be reserved in advance. The seminar and workshops are run simultaneously – please choose one or the other.

CAMS Exam Preparation Seminar

Make the most of your in-person conference experience by attending the CAMS Exam Preparation Seminar on April 7, 2024, the day before the start of the conference. This seminar is complimentary for delegates who purchase the CAMS certification package or who are in the process of certifying and will be sitting for the CAMS exam.

Please note, seating capacity is extremely limited and participation must be reserved in advance by emailing your account manager or filling out our contact form at acams.org/en/help-center.

Convince Your Manager

Attending this ACAMS Hollywood flagship event is a unique opportunity for anyone working in AFC/AML, however obtaining approval from your organization to attend can be challenging. We can help with that.

Here is an email template you can share with your supervisor to prove that attending The Assembly Hollywood is not only a worthwhile investment of both financial resources and time, but also actually key to ensure you are on top of the latest trends and solutions to help fight evolving criminal strategies.

Can I change my ticket to an in-person one if I purchase virtually initially?

Yes. You can request a seat swap to the modality of choice and will be invoiced and/or reimbursed for the difference. The current rates on the day of the request are applicable for changes in modality. Visit acams.org/en/help-center for more information.

What is the health and safety plan?

ACAMS considers the health and safety of all conference attendees a priority. We also encourage all attendees to take necessary protective measures for their individual health circumstances. While masks are no longer required, they remain optional for anyone choosing to wear one. Sanitization stations will also be available throughout the meeting space and those that wish to maintain social distance should do so. If you want to wear a mask but forget yours, please visit our Registration Services Desk for a disposable mask.

What is the cancellation and refund policy?

The Assembly Hollywood 2024 passes are non-refundable. Pass holders may request a pass transfer to attend virtually to another person, colleague, or client up until March 25, 2024. If you are unable to transfer the pass to another person for the 2024 ACAMS conference, Hollywood, Florida event, you can transfer your pass to the next in-person event. Please note, if the transfer is made from an ACAMS member to a non-ACAMS member, you will be charged the difference in cost. If the transfer is from a non-ACAMS member to an ACAMS member, the non-ACAMS member will receive a credit in their account. Refunds will not be available.

Will I earn ACAMS credits?

ACAMS members can earn up to 22 ACAMS credits for attending this event; 16 credits for the main conference, and 3 credits for each pre-conference workshop.

Will I receive a certificate of participation?

Yes. The Certificate of Participation will be sent to participants’ via email within two weeks after the conference.

Are the sessions available on-demand?

Recordings are available on-demand for 90 days after the live ACAMS conference, Hollywood event via the virtual platform – this is available to both in-person and virtual attendees. You can re-watch your favorite or any missed sessions. Please note, not all sessions are recorded.

I cannot register online, what should I do?

Please get in touch with our customer service team by visiting acams.org/en/help-center for more information.

I did not receive the registration confirmation email. What should I do?

Please note the confirmation email can take a couple of hours to be sent. We also recommend that you check your spam folder. . If you still have not received it, please visit acams.org/en/help-center for more information.

How do I access the virtual sessions?

If you’re watching live, you will access this via our streaming platform. Full details will be sent to you when you register.

What if I have a technical issue while attending the virtual event?

Please contact our customer service team by visiting acams.org/en/help-center.

Can I share my login to the virtual event?

Because we’re issuing ACAMS credits for this event, every individual who wants to attend must have their own registration.

Can I sponsor The Assembly Hollywood?

If you have a product or service that our Hollywood ACAMS’ community should be aware of, we’d like to help make that happen. Contact Andrea Winter (awinter@acams.org) for more details.

Can I see who else is attending?

Because of privacy regulations, we can’t release the names of attendees. If you want to know who else is attending, why not join in the conversation on social media in the days and weeks before the conference – use #TheAssembly to connect with other attendees.

Are there any special offers available?

ACAMS members receive special prices for all our events. We also offer a special Public Sector price and group packages. Contact your ACAMS account manager, or visit acams.org/en/help-center for more details.
